0:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1

set -ex
export MINIO_KMS_KES_IDENTITY="$(/kes identity of /run/secrets/client-cert/tls.crt)"
exec /kes server --config /run/configmaps/minio-kes/server-config.yaml

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

[kubernetes]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  desc = "Tripp Lite 1500VA SmartUPS"
  vendorid = "09AE"
  productid = "2012"

MONITOR kubernetes@localhost:3493 1 upsmon secret primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = secret
  upsmon primary
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
